Description: Fragment of base and lower wall with slight ring foot of Attic black-glazed pottery bowl; glazed save for stand-ring and underside of foot; central dot and two rings on underside; inscription cut on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 478)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1850)
